decision_conditions:
<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:&nbsp;</p><p><span style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 107%; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">cuckoohilldrive-46 / 0 existing
ground, cuckoohilldrive-46 / 1 REV B PROPOSED ground, cuckoohilldrive-46 / 2 existing
first, cuckoohilldrive-46 / 3 REV B PROPOSED first, cuckoohilldrive-46 / 4 REV
B PROPOSED second, cuckoohilldrive-46 / 6 REV B PROPOSED elevation, cuckoohilldrive-46
/ 5 existing elevations, cuckoohilldrive-46 / 7 existing roof plan, cuckoohilldrive-46
/ 8 REV B PROPOSED BLOCK PLAN, cuckoohilldrive-46 / 9 REV B PROPOSED roof plan.</span><br></p>
The window(s) in the flank elevations of the proposed development shall be of purpose-made obscure glass and shall thereafter be retained in that form.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no windows / doors, other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevations of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Front porch; single and two storey side to rear extension; single storey rear extension; first floor front extension; alterations and extension to roof; side dormer; rear dormer with Juliette balcony; rooflights in both side roof slopes; external alterations (demolition of attached garage and front entrance canopy)
